This is a bloodscrip picture, but as we know, it has been stated that the system is designed around silvers. It is just being introduced at DR.

Given the bloodscrip inflation, I suspect we'll see more reasonable silver prices, but don't expect moving past masterful to be cheap.

Masterful appears to be the near term standard (3-5 years out), from my perspective.

Also, compounded attributes appears to significantly add cost. 25 services on my greater black ora Kris is over 51k scrip! 8x, HCW, black ora flaring, with minor enhancive qualities.
